title: Ministry of External Affairs, India

review.description: Third time reissuing a passport in year thanks to a million inefficiencies. My interactions with any Indian Consular Ser...vice are compelling enough reason to switch passports with any country...
The passport issuing system has undergone a sea-change over the years but it still needs much work to make it more peopl...e-friendly. The online application process is one which can bed improved...
